name: skyscrapers
description:
Skyscrapers is a logical game.
The goal of the game is to position the skyscrapers in the grid according to some simple rules.

FEATURES
- Unlimited number of games
- 3 different play mode: easy, normal and hard
- Game Center support
- SOS function to help solve the game
- Colored aid to help you find table errors
- Supported languages​​: English, Italian, French, German and Spanish
